下面三個5轉 裝備

S卡
因為冇時石嘅原因 所以變左攞料入野
睡衣：食人花，羊毛，blue cuby(sunny meadows->moving)
茶茶：wheat（曙光）,Fragran Grass(北部平原),Iron Ore(西部礦山)

2轉：狐狸尾巴（曙光平原），食人花，閃碎（神殿入口狼人/神殿怪），種子
3轉：花（神殿怪），閃碎（神殿怪），種子
4轉：血晶（林左Mountain Cave 3,骨頭），火石（林右Shanera Dungeon,熔岩怪），Wheat（林右Mountain Cave 5,Wiggler），水瓶（林右烏龜）
5轉：恐龍皮（黑森），鹿角（Fir Forest's Edge），藍鳥（黑森），老鼠（楓葉森林）
6轉：牙x3 (Basilisks,Lost Desert...act5) 沙x3（sand dwarfs ,temple path,temple site)
7轉：act5打打下草曬，合嘅地方係Chaos Environment
8,9轉：打箱抽料，船旁合

話說是咪有巴絲係論壇到搵到雙開教學?
求LINK

Step 1: Download "Process Explorer"
Step 2: Open Nostale
Step 3: Open Process Explorer (as administrator!!)
Step 4: Press CTRL+F (STRG+F in german)
Step 5: Type in "Entwell" and press "Search"
Step 6: Click on the Process he has found
Step 7: Right-click the "Mutant" type in the lower layer of the programm
Step 8: Click "Close Handle" and accept the following window.
Step 9: Open Nostale again and repeat all the steps as much as u want to open Nostale! (Beware of the rule that you're NOT allowed to run Nostale more than three times!)
